kpi.name: flns_3110e
kpi.formula: decode( (mmmt.period_duration),0,null, /* flns3100a */ (mmmt.eps_attach_succ + mmmt.eps_attach_fail) / (mmmt.period_duration*60)) + decode( (mmmt.period_duration),0,null, /* flns3101a */ nvl(mmmt.eps_detach,0) / (mmmt.period_duration*60)) + decode( (smmt.period_duration),0,null, /* flns3111a */ (nvl(smmt.pdn_connectivity_failed_ue,0) + nvl(smmt.pdn_connectivity_failed_enb,0) + nvl(smmt.ddbearer_ueinit_act_succ,0) + nvl(smmt.ddbearer_ueinit_act_fail,0) + nvl(smmt.ddbearer_pgwinit_act_succ,0) + nvl(smmt.ddbearer_pgwinit_act_fail,0)) / (smmt.period_duration*60)) + decode( (smmt.period_duration),0,null, /* flns3112a */ (nvl(smmt.pdn_connect_failed_collision,0) + nvl(smmt.pdn_connect_failed_unspecified,0) + nvl(smmt.pdn_connectivity_failed_mme,0) + nvl(smmt.pdn_connectivity_failed_sgw,0) + nvl(smmt.pdn_connectivity_successful,0) + nvl(smmt.pdn_connectivity_failed,0) + nvl(smmt.ddbearer_ueinit_deact_succ,0) + nvl(smmt.ddbearer_ueinit_deact_fail,0) + nvl(smmt.ddbearer_mmeinit_deact_succ,0) + nvl(smmt.ddbearer_mmeinit_deact_abnorm,0) + nvl(smmt.ddbearer_pgwinit_deact_succ,0)) / (smmt.period_duration*60)) + decode( (smmt.period_duration),0,null, /* flns3172a */ (smmt.gw_init_bearer_mod_success + smmt.gw_init_bearer_mod_failure + smmt.hss_init_bearer_mod_success + smmt.hss_init_bearer_mod_failure) / (smmt.period_duration*60)) + decode( (mmmt.period_duration),0,null, /* flns3102b */ (mmmt.intratau_wo_sgw_change_succ + nvl(mmmt.intramme_tau_sgw_chg_succ,0) + mmmt.intratau_wo_sgw_change_fail + mmmt.eps_periodic_tau_succ + mmmt.eps_periodic_tau_fail) / (mmmt.period_duration*60)) + decode( (mmmt.period_duration),0,null, /* flns3113a */ (nvl(mmmt.intermme_tau_wo_sgw_chg_succ,0) + nvl(mmmt.intermme_tau_in_fail,0) + nvl(mmmt.intermme_tau_out_succ,0) + nvl(mmmt.intermme_tau_out_fail,0)) / (mmmt.period_duration*60)) + decode( (mmmt.period_duration),0,null, /* flns3103a */ (mmmt.eps_inter_tau_og_succ + mmmt.eps_inter_tau_og_fail + mmmt.eps_cmb_inter_tau_succ + mmmt.eps_cmb_inter_tau_fail) / (mmmt.period_duration*60)) + decode( (mmmt.period_duration),0,null, /* flns3104b */ (mmmt.eps_path_switch_x2_succ + nvl(mmmt.eps_x2ho_sgw_chg_succ,0) + mmmt.eps_path_switch_x2_fail + mmmt.eps_s1ho_succ + nvl(mmmt.intramme_s1ho_sgw_chg_succ,0) + mmmt.eps_s1ho_fail + nvl(mmmt.intramme_s1ho_sgw_chg_fail,0)) / (mmmt.period_duration*60)) + decode( (mmmt.period_duration),0,null, /* flns3114a */ (nvl(mmmt.intermme_s1ho_wo_sgw_chg_succ,0) + nvl(mmmt.intermme_s1ho_in_fail,0) + nvl(mmmt.intermme_s1ho_out_succ,0) + nvl(mmmt.intermme_s1ho_out_fail,0)) / (mmmt.period_duration*60)) + decode( (mmmt.period_duration),0,null, /* flns3105a */ (mmmt.eps_to_3g_gn_isho_succ + mmmt.eps_to_3g_gn_isho_fail + mmmt.eps_to_3g_gn_isho_trgt_reje + mmmt.eps_to_3g_gn_isho_enb_cncl) / (mmmt.period_duration*60)) + decode( (mmmt.period_duration),0,null, /* flns3106a */ (mmmt.eps_paging_succ + mmmt.eps_paging_fail) / (mmmt.period_duration*60)) + decode( (mmmt.period_duration),0,null, /* flns3107a */ (mmmt.eps_service_request_succ + mmmt.eps_service_request_fail) / (mmmt.period_duration*60)) + decode( (mmmt.period_duration),0,null, /* flns3108b */ (mmmt.esr_mo_attempts + mmmt.esr_mt_attempts + mmmt.ESR_MO_EMERGENCY_ATTEMPTS) / (mmmt.period_duration*60)) + decode( (sgsm.period_duration*60),0,null, /* flns3109a */ (sgsm.sgsap_uplink_succ + sgsm.sgsap_uplink_fail + sgsm.sgsap_downlink_succ + sgsm.sgsap_downlink_fail) / (sgsm.period_duration*60))

kpi_info.title: EPS Transactions per second
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows the average amount of EPS transactions per second. This KPI can be used to measure the signaling transaction load/capacity.
kpi_info.formula:
( flns_3100a +
flns_3101a +
flns_3111a +
flns_3112a +
flns_3172a +
flns_3102b +
flns_3113a +
flns_3103a +
flns_3104b +
flns_3114a +
flns_3105a +
flns_3106a +
flns_3107a +
flns_3108b +
flns_3109a )
